column1: Local Foods////Food: All the sandwiches and sides look/sound amazing. I had the falafel sandwich with beets and tuscan kale. Really enjoyed the sandwich--large portion
column2: falafel was flavorful and not dry because of the yogurt sauce
column3: highly recommend. I liked the beets
column4: kale had a little too much parm for me but overall great meal at a reasonable price. There's a decent drink selection too
